name: Liforme Classic Yoga Mat
description:
TRULY REVOLUTIONARY. The original ground-breaking Liforme Classic Yoga Mat features our unique and patented AlignForMe® posture alignment design. The intelligent markers help guide Yogis of all levels and sizes to improve form, posture, and body awareness with every practice.
Experience unmatched non-slip grip, with our incredible GripForMe® top surface material, so you can hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices. Made from sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials, this Yoga mat is truly Planet friendly and body-kind. 
Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning for every pose.
Includes a complimentary Yoga Mat bag for easy carrying and storage.

name: Liforme Cosmic Moon Yoga Mat
description:
TRULY LUMINOUS. The Cosmic Moon Yoga Mat features a radiant moon AlignForMe® posture alignment design, in beautiful shades of yellow, blue, green, lilac, and white on our super-grippy mat surface. Inspired by the celestial energy of the lunar cycle, this visually stunning Yoga mat is designed to support your physical and spiritual transformation.
Printed using durable, eco-friendly, non-toxic inks, our Planet-friendly Yoga mat is made with sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials. The unmatched non-slip surface allowing you to hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices.
Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning for every pose - ideal for all body types and Yoga styles.
Includes a complimentary Yoga Mat bag for easy carrying and storage.

name: Liforme Magic Galaxy Yoga Mat - Gold & Silver
description:
Step onto the Liforme Magic Galaxy Yoga Mat and feel your practice expand in every direction. Inspired by a starry night sky, its celestial AlignForMe® design intuitively guides your posture and balance - transforming every session into something magical.
Each mat is carefully hand-printed using our signature non-toxic, eco-friendly metallic inks, creating a shimmering celestial finish that’s truly unique. The Magic Galaxy is a luminous, gold & silver fully printed design, rich in detail, artistry, and craftsmanship, and is also available in a second celestial palette to suit your vibe: Silver on dusk blue or black mat surface.
Beyond its beauty, it’s engineered for performance: unmatched grip and stability, even through the sweatiest flows. Crafted from sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials, it’s planet-friendly, vegan, and made to perform - practice after practice.
Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning - ideal for all body types and Yoga styles.
Easily transport your Magic Galaxy anywhere on the Planet with our a complimentary Yoga Mat bag making transport and storage effortless.

name: Liforme Tropical Paradise Yoga Mat
description:
TRULY EXOTIC.  Welcome to your oasis, a bright sea of brilliant colours with the Liforme Tropical Paradise Yoga Mat. Featuring a vibrant AlignForMe® design in tropical pink, green, orange, purple, red, yellow, and white flora and fauna, evoking a sunny day in paradise.Printed using durable, eco-friendly, non-toxic ink, our Planet-friendly Yoga mat is made with sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials. This joyful refuge will be your happy place as you move freely on our unmatched non-slip surface allowing you to hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices.Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning for every pose - ideal for all body types and Yoga styles. 
Take your slice of paradise anywhere with the complimentary Yoga Mat bag for easy carrying and storage.

name: Liforme x You - A unique Yoga Mat
description:
Truly Unique. With the Liforme Yoga Mat Customiser, the look of your next mat is completely up to you. Start by picking your favourite Liforme mat colour and theme, then add alignment guidelines (as few or as many as you like) in the colours of your choice and finish it with your signature for a Yoga mat as unique as you are.
Every custom Liforme Yoga Mat features our beloved grippy surface, three-layer construction, and eco-friendly commitment. Our user-friendly interface and innovative printing process make the process fun, quick, and easy.
Complimentary bag included.

name: Liforme Mindful Garden Yoga Mat
description:
TRULY IN BLOOM. Step into your practice with the Liforme Mindful Garden Yoga Mat, featuring a beautiful floral AlignForMe® alignment guide printed in six vibrant, non-toxic, durable eco-friendly ink colours. These intelligent alignment markers work intuitively with your body, allowing you to stay balanced, aligned and centred; creating a joyful place to nurture your Yoga practice.
Featuring our GripForMe® non-slip top surface, this mat delivers unmatched grip and the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning. It’s truly planet-friendly and body-kind, made from sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials.
Longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you the space you need to move freely and practice without limits.
Includes a complimentary Yoga mat bag for effortless carrying and storage.

name: Liforme Blossoming Lotus Yoga Mat
description:
TRULY FLOURISHING. The Blossoming Lotus Yoga Mat is an exuberant reinterpretation of Liforme’s original Lotus centrepiece, which has been featured on our mats since they debuted in 2013. Printed using durable, eco-friendly, non-toxic inks, the AlignForMe® posture alignment design appears in a beautiful gradient of pinks on our grey base, or in rich tangerine and violet tones on our deep purple Earth surface. These intelligent markers help guide Yogis of all levels and sizes to improved posture, balance, and body awareness.
Experience unmatched non-slip surface allowing you to hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices. Made from sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials, it’s truly planet-friendly and body-kind.
Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning for every pose - ideal for all body types and Yoga styles.
Includes a complimentary Yoga Mat bag for easy carrying and storage.

Its creamy base is beautifully printed with a metallic gold AlignForMe® posture alignment design, a magical embellished version of our original alignment system. 
Printed using durable, eco-friendly, non-toxic inks, our Planet-friendly Yoga mat is made with sustainably sourced natural rubber. It offers unmatched non-slip surface allowing you to hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices.

name: Liforme Zodiac Yoga Mat
description:
The special edition Liforme Zodiac Yoga Mats celebrate Good Fortune and the rich symbolism of the Chinese Zodiac. Each mat pays tribute to the Chinese New Year, with past editions honouring the ‘Year of the Rat’, ‘Year of the Pig’, and ‘Year of the Dog’, featuring a unique etched design inspired by the Zodiac Animal. The latest addition is the bold and dynamic ‘Year of the Tiger’ mat, showcasing a striking black and cream tiger-striped AlignForMe® design on a vibrant orange mat surface. 
Experience unmatched non-slip grip, with our incredible GripForMe® top surface material, so you can hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices. Made from sustainably sourced natural rubber and PVC-free materials, this Yoga mat is truly Planet friendly and body-kind. 
Designed to be longer and wider than standard Yoga mats, it gives you more space to move freely, with the perfect balance of firm stability and soft cushioning for every pose.
As part of Liforme’s commitment to conservation, 3% of Liforme.com sales of the Year of the Tiger Yoga Mat will be donated to WWF to support their conservation and campaigning work which is helping to bring our world back to life. WWF-UK is a registered charity in England and Wales 1081247 and in Scotland SC039593 and a company limited by guarantee registered in England and Wales 4016725. 
Includes a complimentary Yoga Mat bag for easy carrying and storage.

TRULY MAGICAL. The Liforme White Magic Yoga Mat, designed in collaboration with international Yoga teacher Kino MacGregor, brings a touch of elegance and enchantment to your practice. Its creamy base is beautifully printed with a metallic gold AlignForMe® posture alignment design, a magical embellished version of our original alignment system. 
Printed using durable, eco-friendly, non-toxic inks, our Planet-friendly Yoga mat is made with sustainably sourced natural rubber and non-toxic materials. It offers unmatched non-slip surface allowing you to hold poses longer and avoid slipping, even in the sweatiest of Yoga practices.
Lighter than our regular Yoga mats, this mat is effortless to carry, perfect for on-the-go practice, whether you’re heading to the studio, traveling, or practicing outdoors.
Includes a complimentary Travel Yoga mat bag for easy travel and storage.

Complimentary Yoga Mat and Travel Yoga Mat bags included

name: Manduka PRO™ Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
A studio-quality yoga mat with unmatched stability and a lifetime guarantee.

The PRO is a high-density yoga mat built to support your home practice. Crafted in Germany since 1997, it delivers floor-like stability with comfortable joint protection, and unmatched durability. A hygienic, closed-cell surface keeps sweat, moisture, and bacteria out of your mat, making it easy to clean and maintain for long-term performance. When you're ready to invest in your home practice, trust the mat that’s built to last with a lifetime guarantee.

name: PROlite® Yoga Mat 4.7mm
description:
The #1 teacher recommended mat mindfully made for a lifetime of flow...on the go.
All the beauty of our signature PRO mat and lighter for on-the-go flow. The PROlite’s super-dense cushioning and textured top layer adapts to your body for unparalleled support and joint protection. A no-slip dot pattern on the bottom layer keeps the mat in place, while closed-cell construction seals out sweat. OEKO-TEX® certified, our PROlite mat is mindfully made for mindful movers.

name: eKO® Yoga Mat 5mm
description: All eKO® Series yoga mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm/sweaty at all, the mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with one of our hand towels to absorb moisture and provide extra traction or to apply our Yoga Grip Gel during your practice. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage. For towel guidance read our Guide to Yoga Towels.

name: eKO® lite Yoga Mat 4mm
description:
A lighter version of our original eKO mat with the same grippy natural rubber top layer and cushioned ride.
Built sustainably for the mindful yogi, the lightweight eKO lite features a naturally grippy Catch-Grip™ surface texture for superior traction combined with our Responsive Ride™ core for a cushioned, springy ride. Sustainably harvested from non-Amazon rubber trees, the eKO lite is made from the planet for practice anywhere on the planet.

name: eKO® Superlite Travel Yoga Mat 1.5mm
description:
Naturally grippy mat made from sustainably harvested tree rubber, in a foldable, travel-ready size.
Designed for yogis on-the-go, the eKO SuperLite combines our signature orange peel top surface in natural rubber for the perfect grip. Our lightest mat to date, this foldable travel-ready mat is built to practice on…anywhere.

name: GRP® Adapt Travel Yoga Mat 1.5mm
description:
The lightest version of our GRP Adapt mat in a foldable, travel-ready size.
Designed with a Satin Grip™ top layer for ultimate grip, the GRP Adapt Travel is the lightest and most versatile option to our GRP Adapt Series, featuring an all grip no slip design in both wet and dry conditions.

name: PRO Travel Yoga Mat 2mm
description:
The #1 mat recommended by teachers worldwide, built to last a lifetime.
Ultra-dense cushioning provides superior support, stability and joint protection.
Closed-cell material seals out moisture and bacteria. Easy to disinfect and clean.
Meticulously crafted in Germany. OEKO-TEX®️ certified.
Pro Tip: Pair with one of our performance towels to increase grip in sweaty sessions.
Standard Length Mat: 2.0 mm thick; 71” x 24”; 2.4 lb

name: PRO® Squared Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PRO mat, in an extra large size for your home yoga sanctuary.
Create your very own home yoga sanctuary or home gym with our PRO Squared yoga mat. This square mat has all the same benefits of our bestselling PRO mat and is supersized to be the ultimate platform for play. The PRO Squared is big enough for two -- there's plenty of room to practice on your own, or with a partner.

name: PRO® Long & Wide Yoga Mat 6mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PRO mat, in a larger size for your home yoga sanctuary or home gym.
Want more mat, but don't have a dedicated workout room or space for it? The PRO Long & Wide can transform your living room into a home studio (and back again) with minimal effort.

name: PROlite® Long & Wide Yoga Mat 4.7mm
description:
All the same benefits of our PROlite mat, in a larger size for your home yoga sanctuary or home gym.
Want more mat, but don't have a dedicated workout room or space for it? The PROlite Long & Wide can transform your living room into a home studio (and back again) with minimal effort.

name: Manduka X Yoga Mat 5mm
description:
One of our most durable and supportive mats built for any yoga or fitness session.
Some of us like to do it all—and that’s who the X mat is built for. Designed with a Double-Weave™ scrim system, this mat provides ultra-durability for any workout routine from yoga to Pilates to cardio. Go barefoot, rock your shoes, take it to the gym…meditate on the beach. With its grippy crosshatch texture, the X mat is the X-factor when it comes to superior fitness support.

name: begin yoga mat 5mm
description:
A thick, cushioned mat with the same high-performance quality at a budget-conscious price.
Looking for a high-performance mat with the same renowned, earth-friendly Manduka craftsmanship…at a lower price? Our Begin mat offers a cushioned ride for easy transitions and joint support, and also features an alignment stripe to guide poses and encourage your continued practice. Reversible and lightweight, Begin is ideal for anyone looking for a high quality mat that’s easy on the wallet.

name: Shala Yoga Rug
description:
A sustainable yoga rug crafted by hand for your outdoor practices and easy flows.























Mindfully made from pre-consumer apparel scraps, the Shala Yoga Rug pays homage to early yogic traditions while also supporting the craftsmanship of artisan weavers. The intricate weave provides support in a machine washable rug for a light flow or meditation at the beach or on an outside surface at your favorite adventure.

name: eKO® Yoga Mat 5mm (SALE)
description: All eKO® Series yoga mats have a closed-cell surface, which will never absorb moisture. Because of this, if you are warm/sweaty at all, the mat will feel slippery, so we always recommend pairing it with one of our hand towels to absorb moisture and provide extra traction or to apply our Yoga Grip Gel during your practice. If you're practicing hot yoga, we recommend a mat towel for full mat coverage. For towel guidance read our Guide to Yoga Towels.
